sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import "../styles/detail-tour.css" import {Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup} from 'reactstrap' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() //static data const tour = tourData.find(tour => tour.id === id); //destructure properties from tour object const {photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize} = tour const {totalRating, avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews) return <>

{title}

{address} {calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ('Not rated') : (({reviews?.length}))}
{city} {price} /per person {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)
}; export default TourDetails;
